name: HomeTempSensor
author: szmeu
disc: My home temperature and humidity sensor based on ESP-01 and DHT22 using example found here on Thing Speak.

comments.author: szmeu
comments.text: Temperatura si umiditatea transmisa la interval de 1 minut, afisarea este o medie a 10 esantioane.Senzorul DHT22 conform specificatiilor are urmatoarele caracteristici:umiditate 0-100%, precizie 2-5%.temperatura -40 - 80 grd C, precizie plus minus 0.5 grd Cinterval de citire 0.5Hz.
